paragraph: Kim Jong-Wook (Korean: 김종욱, born February 1, 1982) is a South Korean singer. He is best known for Only You, the theme song of the popular Korean reality show We Got Married. Before leaving for the army, Kim Jong-wook released a song "Goodbye for Now" (Army Entrance Day), which was released on December 4, 2009. He has a bachelor's degree in industrial engineering from Konkuk University and graduated from the Kyung Hee University Graduate School of Communication.
그대만이 (Only You), We Got Married OST, 2008
그대에게 바래요 (Way Back into Love) with Solbi, 2008
운명을 거슬러 (Going Against Fate) with SG Wannabe, East of Eden OST, 2009
척하면 척 (If You Pretend) with Kang Min-kyung of Davichi, 2009
